name: Mouse Runner (kaidenalessio)
description:
Story: Oh no! The cheese is unreachable! A little mouse once said. Fortunately they have Runner who can guide them to the cheese.

Mouse Runner is a game where you play as Runner, the one and only intelligent mouse that can move freely without any guide.

Your objective is to guide others to the cheese. To do this, press space to place a Direction Pad on the ground.

When the Direction Pad placed at first it will direct others to the Runner's direction (could be up/down/left/right), press space again to change its direction by 90 degrees clockwise.

Controls:

  • Move Runner — arrow keys
  • Place/change Direction Pad — space or enter

Source code: GitHub
